item.epicfight.agony.tooltip: Light and sharp spear allow his owner to perform deadly strokes. Jump attack allow to jump 2 block
skill.wom.agony_plunge.tooltip:
"Disappear in the sky before falling on your enemies."

Attacking enemeies will charge this for up to 3 times.
The Final damage is multiplied by the number of charges
item.epicfight.tormented_mind.tooltip:
A weapon of mass murder and act of abomination.
The axe have absorbed the Wrath of its former bearer
and will transmit it into the next.
item.epicfight.ruine.tooltip:
An ancient weapon, forged with forgotten knowledge and infused with enderman power.
Its balance and design allow for maximum efficiency and accuracy in combat.
skill.wom.plunder_perdition.tooltip:
"Perform the enderman ritual of stealing things form others."

The condensed endpower of the cristal in the hilt
will harvest the life of all enemy in the area.
Each enemy hit will give you 5% of your max stamina and max health back.
Then, the cristal will give you increased overall speed for 10sec (10sec + 10sec x sweeping effect)
The strenght of the speed depens on the number of enemy hit. .
item.epicfight.ender_blaster.tooltip:
This weapon has transcended time and space
in order to find someone who can control its power at its peak.
skill.wom.ender_blast.tooltip:
"The zenith of the end technological power."

The blaster loader is composed of 12 chambers.
Kinetic energy stored in them is transmuted into endpower.
When the trigger is pressed, half of the converted endpower
is condensed into different types of bullets.
The other half is transfered into a condenser that overcharges
the endpower until it blasts the bullet out with tremendous precision.
All of that in just a fraction of a second ... outstanding!
item.epicfight.antitheus.tooltip:
Harvest life in the most horrible and obnoxious way.

Attacks have 20% chance to cause wither II for 6sec.
if the entity allready has wither, then the wither effect
will upgrade to Wither III with the duration refreshed.
skill.wom.demonic_ascension.tooltip:
"The scythe takes possession of your body
and use it to perform terrible things...."

On ascenscion, cause -50%- CATHARSIS on entity's around you on the second blow of the transformation.
In Transformed form, Basic attack and dash attack will apply wither effect,
while jump attack cause -30%- CATHARSIS.

CATHARIS: Reap of the wither effect from the target
dealing all remaining damage at once
and heal you for a -percentage- of that amount.
This, increase the duration of the Ascension
depending on the wither effect intensity.
item.epicfight.demon_seal.tooltip: An old demon is sealed inside this.
skill.wom.charybdis.tooltip: Consume Stamina to perform a whirlwind of hit for a total of 8 strikes. Reduce the stamina consumption with sweeping edge.
gamerule.weightPenalty: Penalty percent of attack speed by weight
epicfight.gui.warn_already_registered: %s Warning: This item is already registered in opponent!
epicfight.gui.tooltip_battle: Automatically registers all items with epicfight attributes.
epicfight.gui.tooltip_mining: Automatically registers all items not included in the battle mode.
gui.epicfight.filter_animation.tooltip: Turning this on will disable the animated model of the player in mining mode
gui.epicfight.health_indicator.tooltip: Turning this off makes the health indicator invisible
gui.epicfight.target_indicator.tooltip: Turning this off makes the target indicator invisible
gui.epicfight.long_press_counter.tooltip: This is the tick it takes to recognize as a long press. Used for special attacks and dodge
gui.epicfight.aim_helper.tooltip: Draw the aim helper during aiming a bow or crossbow
gui.epicfight.camera_auto_switch.tooltip: Automatically switch to the proper camera view when toggle mining/battle mode
gui.epicfight.auto_preparation.tooltip: Automatically switch to the battle mode when player hit
gui.epicfight.auto_switching_items.toolt: Edit the list of items that will automatically switch battle/mining mode.
item.epicfight.katana.tooltip: Sheath the katana after 2 seconds of inactivity. Perform invisible slashes while sheathed. Attacking before sheathing back or any other action will remove your sheathing state
skill.epicfight.dancing_edge.tooltip: Cut down enemies with a swordsmanship that looks like a dancing. It strikes totally three times
skill.epicfight.fatal_draw_ef.tooltip:
Draw your blade at an invisible speed to cut down enemies. Cast while sprinting to perform a fast dash that slice enemies along the path.
This can be stack for up to 12 and each level of sweeping edge you have
will increase the number of stack by 33% on the first draw.
After the first draw, you'll enter sakura state.
If you don't draw again within 2 seconds, you loose all your stacks and get out of sakura state.
skill.epicfight.fatal_draw.tooltip: Draw a sword at an invisible speed and cut down enemies. If you cast while sprinting, It dashes at very high speed slicing enemies in your path.
skill.epicfight.giant_whirlwind.tooltip: Spin forward with heavy weapon crushing the enemies. It strikes totally three times.
skill.epicfight.guillotine_axe.tooltip: Heft an axe then smash it down to execute the enemy.
skill.epicfight.heartpiercer.tooltip: Thrust a spear rapidly three times.
skill.epicfight.slaughter_stance.tooltip: Slice enemies in a wide area. It strikes totally twice.
skill.epicfight.lethal_slicing.tooltip: Stun the target with the elbow and slash them. Depending on the number of enemies hit by the first attack, it strikes up to 2 times.
skill.epicfight.relentless_combo.tooltip: Blow up the target with the gatling punch. It strikes a total of 8 times.
skill.epicfight.liechtenauer.tooltip: Take a solid swordsmanship posture. You can't sprint during the skill is activated, but automatically defends against enemy strikes when you're not attacking. Killing an enemy increases the remaining guard points by up to 4
skill.epicfight.eviscerate.tooltip: Stab the enemy with a knife and pull it out with critical damage.
skill.epicfight.blade_rush.tooltip: Dashes forward quickly and slashes an enemy passing by. This skill can store up to 4 stacks, has 4 consecutive attack moves during the active time, and the last attack dealt enhanced damage. If the enemy dies by this skill, the stack is returned.
skill.epicfight.roll.tooltip:
Stamina : %d

Roll toward the direction the player moves. While executing this skill, player become immune from normal attacks.
skill.epicfight.step.tooltip:
Stamina : %d

Move a short distance. While executing this skill, player become immune from physical attacks.
skill.epicfight.guard.tooltip:
Stamina : Impact taken

Press the item use button then blocks all melee attacks from the front. If you block attacks consecutively, more stamina is consumed.

Available Weapon Types : %s
skill.epicfight.active_guard.tooltip:
The consecutive blocking penalty will be removed when you guard according to the enemy's attack timing. Players will be able to block range attacks.

Available Weapon Types : %s
skill.epicfight.energizing_guard.tooltip:
Reduce the penalty for consecutive blocking to x0.2 per stack. Players will be able to block explosions, fire, magic and range attacks. These damage types deal 80%% less damage.

Available Weapon Types : %s
skill.epicfight.berserker.tooltip: Bonus attack damage by 0.3%% and attack speed by 0.5%% per 1%% of missing HP. Attack speed can't increase more than 5.0
skill.epicfight.stamina_pillager.tooltip: After killing the enemy, gain the 30%% of missing stamina.
skill.epicfight.technician.tooltip: Gain the stamina used when you dodge according to the enemy's attack timing.
skill.wom.ender_step.tooltip:
Stamina : %d

teleport to a grand distance. While executing this skill, player become immune from physical attacks.
skill.wom.counter_attack.tooltip:
Perfect Guard will trigger a counter attack based on weapons attacks.

Available Weapon Types : %s
skill.wom.arrow_tenacity.tooltip: Prevent the stun from arrows damage. This skill is permanent, thus you can use another passive on top of it but, you'll only keep the current passive if you die.
skill.wom.pain_anticipation.tooltip: If no action is performed within 2 sec, gain "Anticipation" this will grant you stun immunity for the next action during 2.0s.
skill.wom.pain_retribution.tooltip: If no action is performed within 4 sec, gain "Retribution" this will grant you stun immunity for the next action during 4.0s and boost your damage by 20% during that time.
skill.wom.vampirize.tooltip: Heal you for 10% of the damage you deal.
skill.wom.precise_roll.tooltip:
Stamina : %d

faster, further and cheaper roll. This is how true expert do a roll.
skill.wom.dodge_master.tooltip:
Stamina : %d

Instinctly dodge a small distance only if you would take damage during the cast of 0.35s.
skill.wom.critical_knowledge.tooltip:
Give you 5% chance to deal 50% more damage.
Critical chance is increase by 7.5%
for each level of thorns enchantement.
With thorns III on each armor piece,
you can get 95% critical chance.
